environment.name: environment
environment.description: The environment to apply to the current command.

verbose.name: verbose
verbose.description: Increase the verbosity of the logs.

name.name: name
name.description: The name of the Hydrogen app.

template.name: template
template.description: The template to use. Can either be a Shopify template name (hello-world or demo-store) or a custom URL to any template.

ts.name: ts
ts.description: Set the language of the template to TypeScript instead of JavaScript.

path.name: path
path.description: The path to the directory where the Hydrogen app will be created.

shopify-cli-version.name: shopify-cli-version
shopify-cli-version.description: The version of the Shopify CLI to use.

hydrogen-version.name: hydrogen-version
hydrogen-version.description: The version of Hydrogen to use.
